flow.descriptionCdata:
eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.2ab7de74-6e0c-47eb-9ea7-e249681bad71.description=
Delete file from remote linux host

 Inputs\: 
 sourceFile - file(absolute path) to be deleted from remote host 
 targetHost - Target host from which file to be deleted 
 targetHostUserName - Target host user name 
 targetHostPassword - target host password  

Responses\:
 success - file was deleted successfully
 failure - file could not be deleted

Result\:
 success/failure of  file deletion action
eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.5c6f0772-e44b-448e-a7ca-8258bc683f3b.description=
Execute script file at remote linux machine 

Inputs\: 
 scriptFile - file to be executed, which reside on remote host
 targetHost - Target host in which the file resides and to be executed 
 targetHostUserName - Target host user name 
 targetHostPassword - target host password  

Response\:
 success - the script file was executed successfully and its output is retrieved
 failure - the script file could not be executed

Results\:
 result of executing script file
eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.603dcce7-4a80-401a-bfd1-ac24c1a3e00a.callout=Copy source file from remote machine eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.7e7b465e-8c2a-44b6-acd6-daf594cd2b4a.description=
 Copy file from local machine to remote linux host 

Inputs\: 
 sourceFile - file to be copied (with absolute path) 
 targetHost - Target host to which file to be copied 
 targetHostUserName - Target host user name 
 targetHostPassword - target host password 

Responses\:
 success - the command was executed successfully and file copied from local machine
 failure - the command could not be executed

Result\:
 file copied from local machine
eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.88bdb041-7db3-49f7-ae3d-29fad791fd5c.callout=Delete the script file eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.99398576-4f18-40fb-9ca3-7d0cdb161c5e.callout=Execute the script file at target machine eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.b0801be3-7792-43c8-8ae8-0a0905e04351.callout=Copy source file from local machine eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.b286c65d-088e-449e-ae5e-c513e34c833e.description=
Compares two strings, returning a true response if and only if they contain the same sequence of characters. A null string is considered to be equal to an empty string.

Inputs\:
string1 - The first string.
string2 - The second string.
ignoreCase - If set to 'true', then the comparison ignores case considerations. The two strings are considered equal ignoring case if they are of the same length and corresponding characters in the two strings are equal ignoring case. If set to any value other than 'true', then the strings must match exactly to be considered equal.

responses\:
true - If the two strings are equal
false - If the two strings are not equal
eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.c57047ae-3ccf-47e2-aac6-e3435db9808f.description=
Copy file from source remote host to target remote host

Inputs\: 
 sourceHost - source host from which file to be copied 
 sourceHostUserName -  source host user name 
 sourceHostPassword- source host password 
 sourceFile - file to be copied (with absolute path) 
 targetHost - Target host to which file to be copied 
 targetHostUserName - Target host user name 
 targetHostPassword - target host password
 targetFile - the location on the target host where the script will be copied (with absolute path). If the target path does not exist, the operation will fail. If no value is provided for this input, the value of the sourceFile input will be also used as target.

Response\:
 success - the command was executed successfully and file copied from remote machine
 failure - the command could not be executed

Result\:
 file copied from remote machine
eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.description=
Demonstrate running script file in Linux host by copying script file from remote or local host.

Inputs\: 
    fileHost - The script file host, either remote or local machine.
Valid values\: remote, local
    sourceHost - The source host from which file to be copied. This will only be considered when the  is assigned the value 'remote'.
    sourceHostUserName - The source host user name. This will only be considered when the  is assigned the value 'remote'.
    sourceHostPassword - The source host password. This will only be considered when the  is assigned the value 'remote'.
    sourceFile - The script file to be copied (with absolute path).  
    targetHost - Target host to which file to be copied.
    targetHostUserName - The target host user name. 
    targetHostPassword - The target host password.
    targetFile - the location on the target host where the script will be copied (with absolute path). If the target path does not exist, the operation will fail. If no value is provided for this input, the value of the sourceFile input will be also used as target.

Responses\:
    success - The flow completed as stated in the description.
    failure - The flow completed unsuccessfully.
eb354e4c-79f8-42bc-aed5-1370446960d5.eb56482d-e338-4df4-82b1-8d2807025d41.callout=Selecte source file location
flow.name: Remote Script Runner

scriptlet.name: default
default
